survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Bicycle Sharing Programs Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of urban bicycle sharing programs to evaluate satisfaction levels, identify pain points, and improve service offerings.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use bicycle sharing programs in your city?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clear frequency measurement. Mobile-friendly design recommended.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use bicycle sharing programs in your city?

questions.question_text: What factors influence your decision to use a bicycle sharing program? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice checkbox format allows for multiple selections. Randomize option order to reduce bias.

script.question_text: What factors influence your decision to use a bicycle sharing program? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with the availability of bicycles at your preferred locations?
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale with labeled endpoints. Include visual analog scale if possible.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE (radio buttons with scale display)

script.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how satisfied are you with the availability of bicycles at your preferred locations?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the bicycle sharing program in your city?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response to 250 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: OPEN_TEXT (text input box with character limit)

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the bicycle sharing program in your city?

questions.question_text: Have you experienced any technical issues with the bicycle sharing mobile app?
answer_options: I don't use the mobile app
questions.client_notes: Include an option for non-app users to prevent forced responses. Mobile-first design crucial.

script.question_text: Have you experienced any technical issues with the bicycle sharing mobile app?
answer_options: I don't use the mobile app
